EmailTemplate.name: EDUT - Register Ticket - Outside Course Request (Employee)
EmailTemplate.subject: [EDUT] Ticket# {!Case.CaseNumber} has been received
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Sir/Madam,
This email is a follow-up to your inquiry: Ticket#: {!Case.CaseNumber} Subject: {!Case.Subject} Created: {!Case.CreatedDate}
In order to process your inquiry we require additional information. To expedite your request, kindly provide the information on the form provided and reply to this email with the completed form attached. Your request will be processed and a response will be provided within the given time frames listed below.
We appreciate your patience and will respond within our estimated completion time: Content Issues: Up to 5 business days Course not marked as completed: Up to 2 business days Enrollments: 1 to 5 business days depending on the class date Requesting a New Internal Session: Up to 10 business days, with course delivery within 45 days Requesting a New External Session: Up to 4 business days for critical classes, up to 8 business days for non-critical classes
If you have additional questions or require further assistance, please contact us by replying to this email.
Kind Regards, NokiaEDU
Global Contact Center
